snippet: A Madrid demonstration in sympathy with protests in the northern Spanish city of Burgos against a local government plan to convert a street into a tree-lined boulevard turned violent on Wednesday, leading to 11 arrests and 11 injuries....

headline.print_headline: Spanish Protesters Riot in Madrid, 11 People Hurt
headline.main: Spanish Protesters Riot in Madrid, 11 People Hurt

lead_paragraph: A Madrid demonstration in sympathy with protests in the northern Spanish city of Burgos against a local government plan to convert a street into a tree-lined boulevard turned violent on Wednesday, leading to 11 arrests and 11 injuries.
